comments.comment:
Moral of srilanka economy's recovery is to earn local expenses from local sources and pay the $ loans using doller income and fdi.
Vat reduction is o.k but PAYE tax reduction will pave the way for higher demand for imported products. 
Govt.need to impose higher taxes on imported items such as vehicles ,fruits and vegetables and milk powders except infants " .tax should be high as termination of imports.
